TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Stupidity becomes widely accepted, leading to collapse of society.

I wish that constant, outrageous and annoying stupidity was banned.

Granted, but the decision making about what's stupid and what's not has been put in the hands of the most outrageously annoying and dumb person.

I wish I could stop water with the power of my thought.

Granted. But you can't get it flowing again...

I wish that there weren't so many Apple fanboys harrasing me for choosing BlackBerry over iPhone and Ubuntu over OS X.

Granted. But you can't get it flowing again...

I wish that there weren't so many Apple fanboys harrasing me for choosing BlackBerry over iPhone and Ubuntu over OS X.

Granted, but you have to get an iPhone and install OS X as they are now the only option for everyone

I with I had a working portal gun.

Granted. GlaDOS now controls your life and is using you to do science.

I wish electric razors worked well for me.

Granted, they work too well, and shave off all your hair.

I wish yesterday.

Granted. No future for you.

I wish for MOAR BOOSTERZ!!!

Granted: moar separatrons!!!

I wish i was a glove.

granted. you are now a glove compartment.

I wish for the world to have a giant galaxy booster to boost us out of danger.

Edited February 18, 2015 by Guest
Oops...

Granted. It cannot be shutdown in flight and the galaxy keeps speeding out to the edge of space....

I wish that me and my fiancee are the last two living people in the world.

Granted. It cannot be shutdown in flight and the galaxy keeps speeding out to the edge of space....

I wish that me and my fiancee are the last two living people in the world.

Granted, however she becomes the ugliest person you'll ever see.

I wish that I had a fiancee.

Granted. She turns into BrideZilla as the wedding planning progresses. (Or GroomZilla, if that's appropriate)

I wish people didn't make such a big deal out of weddings.

Granted. Your wife absolutely ignores the fact that she's married and goes out with another during your wedding night.

I wish we stopped talking about relationships.

Granted, all relationships are now kept very secret, and never spoken of.

I wish that I had a nice hot bowl of apple cinnimon oatmeal.

Edited February 18, 2015 by r4pt0r

Granted. You can't eat it.

I wish that Lufthansa flights were cheaper.

Granted, "cinnimon" happens to be a very poisonous substance found on the planet Zog.

Wait... you didn't mean cinnamon, did you? whooooops........... O.O JebKerboom u sneaky ninja!

Granted, they are cheaper if you pre-ordered a year ago, and you're a 1st class super-mega-premium customer.

I wish for a one Antarctican dollar.

Edited February 18, 2015 by Overfloater

Granted. It's made of ice, and melts in your pocket.

I wish for this school day to get over with.

Granted, however it is over due to time ending.

I wish my fingernails grew faster and strong (like 3x as fast as now), but I could stop the speed growth with a button.

granted. you are overcome by an urge to gnaw on you bigger fingernails

i wish i didn't have this problem

Granted. You no longer exist.

I wish for this wish to have absolutely no impact on anything whatsoever

Granted. Instead of having an impact, bumps spontaneously appear everywhere.

I wish for a flawless spoonorc.

Granted, you get an orc that is part spoon...

I wish I was already doing my pilot's training

Granted, but then you can't be on the KSP forum (right now)

I wish I couldn't swim.

Granted, but you notice a lot more water around you after this wish. Time to die?

I wish I shrunk 4 centimetres so I could be an astronaut.

Granted, but you die during training before your first mission.

I wish I had a wish.
